attributes.action: Free parking permit for NHS staff
attributes.additional_details: I believe the NHS staff need our support to be able to get to work and not worry about getting parking fine, they are saving lives especially they are still under paid, it is not fair to take money from them.
attributes.background:
I would like to ask the government to offer NHS staff to have free parking permit near their work .
They are the heroes when the country is in crisis, please look after them.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307909
